Texts.Chs: 把^green;增强铠甲^reset;带给^orange;凯文^reset;，地点是^orange;科学前哨站^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Booster Croptop^reset; to ^orange;Kevin^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我需要把一个珍贵的娃娃装扮成^green;一个同事的母亲^reset;的样子... 你可以在^green;纺车^reset;上给我制作一个^orange;增强铠甲^reset;吗？我的纺织技术不好，我会给你付钱的！嘘~
Texts.Eng: I need to dress a pleasure doll to look exactly like ^green;a coworkers mother^reset;... Can you make me a ^orange;Booster Croptop^reset;? on a ^green;Sewing Wheel^reset;? I suck at sewing, and I'll pay you. Shh!

Texts.Chs: 现在到第二阶段了！他永远不会见到它的！谢谢你的帮助。带上这个手提箱吧，不过不要在这里打开它。否则所有人会^green;超级嫉妒^reset; 你并试图偷走它！相信我。
Texts.Eng: Now for phase two! He'll never see it coming! Thanks for the help. Take this awesome briefcase. Don't open it here, or everyone will get ^green;super jealous^reset; and try to steal it. Trust me.

Texts.Chs: 他们为什么这么讨厌凯文？
